name: iterations
description: Simulation repetitions with the same parameters

name: predator_randomness
description: Percentage of random actions during aggressive pursuit

name: predator_aggressive_speed
description: Percentage of step taken by the predator on each turn

description: Predator behavior when prey is not visible

description: Strategy used to prune search trees between POIs

name: particles
description: Number of particles in belief state
